description: A job's a job...and hey, you get to dress like a clown at the mall - hard to beat that, Keep passing out those dumb balloons, honking that annoying horn and maybe you'll get noticed someday.

You're in luck! The Grumpy Hamster Show people saw your clown act at the mall and hired you for their new kiddie show! Keep smiling and turn up your CHARISMA if you ever want out of this sad existence.

That freak accident where you set your hamster suit on fire impressed the studio so much, they promoted you to stunt double! Build up that BODY and make some friends quick, so you can land a real acting gig.
You looked so good covered in blood after your last stunt accident, they decided to put you in horror movies! Get more CREATIVE...or your career level will be the only scary thing around here.

Finally, a real acting job! It's only TV, but you're being seen by millions! The hours are long and your fans are sad...and really boring. See if your friends can hook you up with something more hip, before you burn out.

You Hit the Jackpot! Well, at least that's the hot game show you get to host! Flashy clothes, fancy cars, and expensive prizes - the contestants get it and you don't! Channel that anger into creativity...ONE DAY it will all be yours!

All those fake smiles and kisses finally paid off! You're so hot right now, studios are fighting for your contract! But don't slack off - Everyone wants YOUR job, and they can't WAIT to see you fail! Can you take the pressure?

You have been voted the HOTTEST Sim by WhooNoo magazine! Endless parties, endless affairs, endless parties, lost weekends, endless parties...endless fame. Party, fame, party, fame, party...is that ALL there is? If you sober up, maybe you'll find out.

The studio took a big chance making your first movie, but it's a hit! You're hailed as a genius BEHIND the camera, as well as front of it! Keep your creative juices flowing and people you trust near, and the world will be yours!

You've lost count of all the blockbusters you've made by now. Your fans will see anything you make, and people literally fight to be in your movies. Just kick back, have a cigar, and let the money ROLL IN! How SWEET it is!

Yeah, it's early level drudgery, but look at the access to benefits: easy access to centrifuges, playing with insects, late nights all alone with a test tube, and joys of joys...tasting secret potions! It's better than grad school!
Your high metabolism and resistance to side effects got you noticed at work! Now they want you to drink their experimental concoctions full-time! Study up on MECHANICAL if you want to advance.

All those potions made you kind of crazy! All you can think about is setting fires now! Luckily, your new job involves testing experimental fuels, explosives and unstable chemicals? so you are very fulfilled. Find some FRIENDS who share your passion.

You burned out on pyromania... your new obsession is microbiology! Germs, viruses, microbes... oh the beauty... the PERFECTION of nature! Why won't they listen to you? Polish your CHARISMA, and maybe they will...

Virus schmirus! Chemistry is the way of the future! Why rely on Mother Nature when you can create everything yourself? Discover the secret LOGIC of the universe as you create crazy molecules that nature never intended!
What is chemistry compared to the flesh of living, breathing, thinking animals? Learn about anatomy muscle MECHANICS, and fight or flight responses the old fashioned way...through live dissections.

Leg and brain grafting is so old fashioned...you've moved on to the next big thing...genetics! Cloning, gene splicing, chimeric recombinant subviral RNA with repressive proteins! Practice giving science lectures about the new religion...YOU!

You're sick of relying on living tissue to experiment with life, and your crazy lectures fell on deaf ears. The fools! You've moved on to robotics to spite them all! If existing life forms won't bend to your will...then you can create your own!!!�

Creating robots in your own image has seriously twisted your mind. Now you only dream about Schr�dinger's cat, wormholes, uncertainty principles and anti-matter. What does it all mean? It means you're a true GENIUS!

It is all perfectly crystal clear now... like a laser beam focused on your mind. Nothing means anything. Everything needs to go. If you can't have it all...nobody can. And you're the one who's going to show them how...one day.

Why are they paying you to vandalize such a nice neighborhood? Spray paint houses, break street lights, slash car tires and throw trash everywhere. A guy gives you money in a brown bag each day...don't ask questions!
Your zest for ruining the community caught the bosses eye. Get the old "five fingered discount" as often as possible, and start thinking CREATIVELY about more interesting crimes.

Now you're "in" - in people's homes that is! Creepy through the dark like a modern day ninja, helping yourself to their hard-earned valuables. Learn to use advanced tools and get some FRIENDS for the really big jobs.

Any thief knows the real money is in car theft, but you do it with a CREATIVE twist. By reading obscure manuals and learning from old pros, you can bypass the car alarms as soon as they roll off the assembly line!

You accidentally stole your boss's limo, so he gave you a job with less brains, and more MUSCLE. Beating people for money is pretty rewarding...for you at least. Learn some new skills before they start calling you "Muggsy".

Your reputation on the street as a brutal enforcer got you noticed quickly. The Boss likes your style and wants you at his side from now on. If anyone tries to touch him, if they even look at him wrong, beat them to a pulp!

There's nothing like a nice, warm cozy fire! The dancing flames reflecting in your tear-filled eyes give you a terrifying appearance. If only they knew they were tears of joy! The screams just add to your pleasure now...

Your past experience with vandalism, burglary, mugging and arson has uniquely qualified you for your new job. All YOU have to do is show up, and they hand over the money. Keep pumping up your body and your reputation to keep everyone scared.
Some people just don't listen to reason...that's when you come in. When the Boss has a "mess" that needs "cleaning," he relies on your expertise in quick, efficient and dependable disposal jobs.

Too bad the boss wouldn't give you that big raise you wanted...he might have lived. Now YOU run the family. People have to do what YOU say! Just honor the "agreement" with all the other bosses, and everyone gets FILTHY RICH.

You're just a prop for all sorts of junk: cheap watches, credit cards, frying pans, rubber gloves, baby wipes, acne pads, and video game controllers. But nobody sees your face! Hide your tears and maybe they will someday.
Your scantily clad lower half appears in newspapers and catalogs across the country, yet ironically, nobody knows who you are. Figure out how to get more CREATIVE.

Your expertise in modelling lingerie has made you a bikini waxing evangelist, and your new "Ultra-Brazilian" technique has everyone talking...when they're not screaming! It's a living, but you'll need to make FRIENDS if you want to find real work.
Did you know there are over 15,000 colors of nail polish available? Plus it's really a new ART form - there are French nails, henna nails, pierced nails, even floral prints! Get CREATIVE...go wild!

Doing nails was alright, but if you really want to turn heads, you need to work with hair! Your only clients are cancer patients and drag queens, but hey...you get to make people look and feel their best. Isn't that what fashion is all about?

Your fancy wig designs caught the eye of a local celebrity. She wants you to be her full-time stylist! The best part is, you get access to all the hottest gossip and hottest models in town! Better work on your BODY, if you want to "fit in."
All the models LOVED what you did with their hair, now they want you to do their makeup too! You even get to be backstage with them at the shows! Aren't models just the NICEST people?

All the other models are in a SNIT! The big fashion designer thought YOU looked better in his clothes than they did! You're finally in, so keep doing your little turn on the catwalk and your signature pout...who knows how long you'll be the hot new thing?

The full color, 15 page, glorious full body pictorial in 5 magazines simultaneously. Scandal? No- nothing but talk shows, awards ceremonies, and endless trips to the bank! You're the sexiest Sim in the world!
Your face is on the cover of every magazine, in every movie, and taped to every teen-ager's mirror in the land! And your new magazine and clothing line? Better than printing MONEY.

This job stinks! You get up at crack of dawn, shovel you-know-what for hours, then douse it all in gasoline and burn it up. You know what that smells like? It sure isn't victory... Just work hard and hope you get noticed.
You're good at cleaning toilets? Good! Now you get to scrape dung off boots! That's military meritocracy... Brush up on your LOGIC skills or you'll be brushing boots forever.
Now it's YOUR turn to do the yelling! You turn fat, lazy, stupid recruits into lean, mean, killing machines. Just make sure those maggots are more scared of you than the enemy by BODY building.

The base got boring quick! Now you're getting dropped behind enemy lines and taking hostile fire almost every day, and that's just in a fake war game! Keep building your muscles for the real thing though.

Your dreams of flying have come true! Ferrying supplies, dropping Rangers off on missions, hunting terrorists in some God-forsaken desert waste - it's all exciting! But don't forget your FRIENDS, they're really all you've got.

Now this is what the military is all about! You get to travel the world, see exotic places, meet interesting people, learn about politics, get DIRECTLY involved in solving political problems...play with guns...it's great!

***CLASSIFIED***
***CLASSIFIED***
***CLASSIFIED***
VELVET DE82904E BF899B8B DE82904A BCA99B83 GOLDMINE DEA90332 BCA 99B84 DEA903E2 ?NameLocal:3 BCA99B84 DEA9033A BCA99884 [6 AM]
Your mission is to support the president, the security council and all the officials who make and execute national security by providing accurate, comprehensive, and TOTAL information awareness.

Finally, they've got someone with actual combat experience running the military! YOU! But your battles only take place at dinner parties, fund raisers, and press conferences now. Fight the political battle by keeping your powder, and your humor...dry.
Why work for money when you can just ask for it? 9 to 5 jobs are for suckers caught up in the machine. They're just a bunch of puppets! The more you mock them, the more money they give you!
You've got to wake people up to reality! Press flyers for psychic fairs, meditation camps and cooking classes into their greedy hands. Make friends and learn some skills to further the revolution!

Art is the answer! By filling the world with beauty, maybe people will finally see the beauty in themselves...and each other. You're not in this for the money, you're in it for developing your skills.
Art isn't enough anymore...you've got to live a whole new way to make them see the truth. Spend time cooking and chatting. Love and laughter will heal all!

Your interest in nutrition has put you...in touch...with people that need healing. Not only can you make some decent money, but you can change your clients lives in person. Just don't rub people the wrong way.

Massage work was a great way to help people, but it was only one at a time. As a yoga instructor...it's a "one to many" relationship. Many people learn, many people pay. Everyone feels better afterwards.
Your gift for difficult poses, deep breathing and cutting through the BS has made you something of a local celebrity. Start practicing and giving speeches to spread the word and spread the love.
Your speeches have translated into 98 languages and disciples have come from around the world to listen to your every word. Love really is the answer, at least to your financial problems!
Not everyone is buying your "love trip", but one thing they can understand is being "free"! Your public love-ins and annual "Burning Clothes" festival are mandatory events for anyone who is anyone

The power, the lust, the mental gymnastics, the non-stop parade of freaks, utopians, pagans, lovers, the mad money...it's all a bunch of lies! Well, money doesn't lie at least. Meditate on that...while you keep up the facade.
A young athlete has to start somewhere - even if it's sweating inside a cartoon animal suit. A very physical grunt job with lousy pay--but at least you can watch the game from up close. Take notes.
Now you get to ACTUALLY touch the balls owned by your favorite team! It's your special privilege to gather everything they need. But all that fetching is going to tire you out... unless you WORK OUT.

A scout spotted you in a local pickup game and figured you had talent. Welcome to the "Llamas," Sim City's minor league team. Your starting pay isn't much and you'll have a lot of training time to deal with. Develop your body skill so you can rise through the ranks.

You've made it off the bench and into the starting line up. Some money's coming in, but long practices take their toll on your mood. Get your rest and keep your body in prime shape. Since you're going to be interviewed more now, work on your charisma too.

You've become a household name in Sim City. You need to be comfortable speaking in front of a camera, not just playing in front of one. Plus, it's time to start making some friends if you really want to "score".

You're heading through the mid-point of your career. There is a special need to work on relationship skills here and present a positive image. If the fans love you, that fills the stadium--and that fills your pay envelope.
Major income, you've got those commercial endorsements, and you're at the top of your game. Your body works like a well-oiled machine but it's taking longer to recover from your injuries.

You're retired from playing: a change both dreaded and welcome. Now your hardest move is turning pages in a play book. Make sure you're still networking with friends because your relationships and creativity are going to get you further than your body skill can.

More prestige and a nicer paycheck, but longer work hours dealing with the media, video game companies, and the team's constant personal problems. Remember to ALWAYS smile in public...think of the children.

You are now a "living legend". The residents of SimCity shower you with a ticker tape parade, and your number is retired. The team gives you an office and salary as their "goodwill ambassador". This is as good as it gets!

It's awkward at first, but you'll get used to it. In fact, there is something true and inspiring about the human figure...especially yours. Chat up the art students and maybe you can score a better paying gig.

Well the pay isn't much better, and the work is harder, but at least you're getting to paint! Get CREATIVE with those brushes and rollers and imagine your own masterpieces as you slap on another coat of weather-all latex.

Now you get to work with a REAL artist! Well, at least you get to clean up after them...and mix their paints...and paint their paintings...Hey! You're doing all the work and they're getting all the money! Better make some new friends and find a way out of this rip off!
Your art world connection scored you a great job at the art mueseum! Now you can stare at your favorite painting for hours and hours and hours and hours and hey...that painting isn't so great...
You're finally selling enough work to support yourself, but just barely. Work on your style, your technique and most importantly...this is KEY...making more friends. One day, you'll be famous!

Your longwinded art manifesto made quite an impression! A local corporation has hired you as their "resident artist" to soften up their harsh image. Work on your BODY to perfect your controversial anti-corporate performance pieces.

Your friend enjoyed your insulting critiques of the current art scene so much, she hired you as art critic for her magazine! Charm the art world with your pen, as well as your palette, and you'll be the next big thing!

Your work is so "art-smart," it puts everyone else to shame! The politics, the humor, the IRONY! And you're the like of every party you attend! Keep sharpening your tongue and image, if you want to stay on top.
You were hot as an artist? Now they'll find out what hot REALLY means! By controlling who and what gets shown, you control what and who gets known, Pure unadulterated POWER!

Your appointment to museum director has solidified your stranglehold on culture, on society and on creativity. And that's exactly how you intend to keep it. If they don't agree with your tastes... they can always emigrate!

Any idiot could do this job...that's why it's perfect for you! The early hours are bad enough, but the annoying, whiny, non-tipping customers are the worst. Get back at them by showing up late and installing the wrong channels for the fun of it.

Put the next version of the software through its paces, and break it as often as possible. The Company is depending on you to make sure this code arrives on the store shelves in the cleanest possible condition, just stay awake!

Time in the testing trenches has earned you a break working on the phones. The hours are more regular, but the work isn't very entertaining. Keep up on the latest technology trends, and watch out for those nifty bugs that slipped through the cracks.

Creating all those Auto-response emails in tech support got pretty boring, so you invented a new email virus! And the anti-virus people hired you to keep them in business! Make friends with other script kiddies to get better.

All that destructive behaviour has made you feel guilty. It's time to get CREATIVE with web design! It's all about the user experience, about being fresh, about communicating and community! Basically...it's all about pop-ups!

You've decide the web ISN'T about pop-ups...it's about stupid people. Stupid people that leave their systems unprotected. Stupid people that don't change passwords on their bank accounts. It's your job to teach them a lesson...the HARD way!

Why risk prison time, when you can make more money going legit? Sure the hours are long, but so are the numbers on your pay check. Hit your keyboard, hit you deadlines, and hit the mattress...you won't have much time for much else.
You've bridged the gap between software and...weird toys. Hours are ridiculously long, work is physically and mentally exhausting, and your ideas are crazy...but they just might work!

You breakthrough diaper-wetting dolls have catapulted you to the top of the Al lecture circuit. If only you could bridge the gap between humans and machine...a new era in human evolution could start...

Finally...humanity has taken control of its destiny...well at least YOU have. Being part machine and immortal has its benefits, but it's still a full-time job evangelising the future in person. Don't forget to recharge your batteries!
You get to cook and clean for the band, as well as drive the bus, score the "refreshments" and satisfy their "needs". Well? What did you expect by answering a want ad for a Groupie?

You made it through the rigorous groupie hazing process, so the band gave you a break and hired you to schlep their stuff around. It's low pay, but at least you get to absorb all the CREATIVE music you'll see on the road.

Being a roadie sucked, but all those bands you heard were amazing! As a record store clerk, you can hear even more of it too! Take advantage of the "creative" atmosphere to make friends and learn some better skills while avoiding real work.
Turning your back on the underground was easier than you thought, and the added money doesn't hurt either. Plus, you get to entertain millions of people as they ride elevators... a captive audience!
The studio loves your elevator music! Now your cute, inoffensive, yet painfully memorable tunes make laundry detergents, laxatives and even denture creams sound exciting all over again!

It's good to be back on stage. But dealing with iritable families night after night and a diet of cake and punch is taking its toll on your sanity, and your waistline. Keep working out, or you'll never get into a REAL band.

You're on tour! A tour of the local bar band scene that is. Your fans are totally loyal...but totally local. If you want to rise to the top of the heap, you'd better have the top sound. Practive makes perfect.

The roof is on fire, but you don't even care, cause you're freaking people out with your crazy hair! It doesn't bother you, if people think you're funny. You're a big rock star, and making lots of money, money, MONEY, MONEY!

The band fell apart finally. It wasn't the music, or the freaky parties, or the gender bending, or the deliciously decadent mountains of pure... ah forget it, It's time for a solo album... everyone make on eventually.

Your career speaks for itself: constant innovation, leadership, experimentation and risk. Your sound has defined an ERA and influenced an entire generation... of other producers, Keep 'em guessing by insisting on the cowbell from time to time, just because you can.
It's a wonder this job even exists anymore, but here you are...selling vacuum cleaners door to door. Funny thing is, you are GOOD at selling them! Maybe this was the right career move after all...
You managed to talk a used car dealer into buying a vacuum for his cars...then he offered you HIS job! It's obvious you're a natural at this...just turn up your CHARISMA, this road is wide open!

Used cars is child's play. Telemarketing is where you're at now. Preying on the elderly, the dumb, and the naive...you can make WAY more money. Make some friends so you can perfect lying techniques in your off hours.

Telemarketing was just a stepping stone to the scams you run now: import/export schemes, forged prescriptions, stupidity insurance...learn to sound more LOGICAL, and you could probably sell pet pebbles to people!

Your pet pebble idea rocks! The big toy companies blew you off, but who's laughing NOW? Your high-energy infomercials can't be resisted! Everyone's gotta have a pet pebble! Get more CREATIVE and maybe you'll get lucky again.
You fast-talked some gullible investors into bankrolling your cockamamie robot-puppet-kindle show line of self-aware action figures! Make as much money as you can, before the company goes bankrupt!
With money you embezzled from the toy company, you started your own "bank" ...of sorts. Your loan broke suckers of your money and charge the fools exorbitant rates of interest! And it's all legal!

Running a savings and loan got boring, the sexy money is all in real estate! It's pretty fun! Kick out poor people from the slums, buy it all up cheap. Then get federal subsidies to pay for renovations! Isn't this country great?
Now that you know how the system REALLY works, why not take advantage of it? Everyone you know is part of one big happy MONEY CLUB. You help them...they help you...everybody wins!

It's amazing what people believe these days...and they believe you! They believe your layers, your lobbyists, your senators, your TV commercials. If competition emerges, just buy it up...or destroy it!

Hey, being a janitor ain't so bad. You can work alone, at night, and nobody bothers you. No thinking is required or needed, and you get to practice sweeping, mopping, vacuuming and unclogging toilets....what could be better?

You couldn't take the isolation of janitorial work, so you took a clerk job to meets lots of people...lots of 3 AM kind of people. Better learn some new SKILLS, that is... if you have ANY ambition at all.

Well you wanted to work on cars, but all they'll let you do is pump gas, and even that's automated. You're just stuck behind a counter...AGAIN. Try making some new FRIENDS, and maybe you'll line up a new line of work.
